title: Kangaroo Island: A Story of an Australian Mallee Forest
description: Off the coast of Adelaide, South Australia is a marvelous place where sea lions, penguins, cockatoos and possums dwell amidst the eucalyptus shrubs or mallee and alongside kangaroos, that give the island its name.Book - Colorful illustrations and interesting facts- Poster and bonus facts- 36 pages- Hardcover 8 1/4 x 10 1/4 inches- Appropriate for 3-7 years
author: Deirdre Langeland
